alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Sensational new breakthrough in Improbability Physics. As soon as the ship's drive reaches infinite improbability it passes through every point in the Universe. Be the envy of other major governments."

- From a sales brochure. Douglas Adams, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, Chapter 11
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Sensational New Breakthrough in Improbability Physics
